channel.title: Pure Techno Underground
channel.description: All underground Techno show, presented by Electric Colour (Ireland). No pop, chart or major labels allowed! Songs are DJ mixed live (as originally intended), focusing on techno - deep, driving, modern, innovative, classic. Featuring music from labels Soma, Klockworks, Ostgut Ton, Ilian Tape, Mixmag, Resident Advisor, Drumcode and more
channel.itunes:summary: Top shelf techno - all underground, no pop. Each monthly episode will be DJ mixed live (as originally intended), focusing on techno - deep, driving, modern, innovative, classic.. Hosted by Electric Colour from Ireland - minimal talking! <--> Featuring music from labels such as Soma, Midgar, Fides, Modularz, Voam, SK Black, Klockworks, Drumcode, Ostgut Ton, Phantasy, Ilian Tape, Kompakt, Mixmag, Resident Advisor, Phantasy and more. <--> Music played will also be available in a streaming playlist on several platforms where available. <--> Mainstay artists such as Blawan, Butch, Skee Mask, Daniel Avery, Carl Craig, Architectural, Karenn, Temudo, Acronym, Blawan, Yan Cook and more.
channel.itunes:author: Electric Colour
channel.itunes:subtitle: Best in Techno music, mixed and hosted by Electric Colour

item.title: Underground Techno - European, Uk, Berlin Warehouse - EP03
item.description:
EP 03. Pure techno. Minimal talking, DJ mix focus…

Music from Rote (Avery, Volte-Face), Architectural, Simian Mobile Disco, Barker and Baumecker, Terence Fixmer, Tessela, Peverelist, Deadbeat, Polar Inertia(Voiski), Carl Craig, Appleblim & Ramadanman, Martinez, Heathered Pearls, James Holden, John Selway, Koenig Cylinders, Surgeon, Moderat, DJ Hell, Richard Bartz and Skee Mask

Labels: BleeD, Architectural, Delicacies, Ostgut Ton, Electric Deluxe, Livity Sound, BLKRTZ, Dement3d Records, Aus Music, Cadenza, Ghostly International, V2, Exacta.udio, Dynamic Tension, BPitch Control, Kurbel, Ilian Tape

Songs in this mix (or ones like them) can be found in the “Pure Techno Underground” playlist on Spotify primarily – http://spoti.fi/2ENC0di but also Youtube and Deezer.

More shenanigans and related treats can be found at:

  • Pure Techno Underground on Spotify
  • Diplomatic Enjoy
  • Soundcloud
  • Instagram

item.title: Best Techno Festivals Soundtrack - Pure Techno Underground, EP02
item.description:
Best Techno Festivals Soundtrack - Pure Techno Underground, EP02


  • No Time - Sebastian Voigt (Outcast Oddity)

  • Butch - The Message (Dub) (Tuskagee) - I think this is vinyl only, I can only find the vocal version on streaming.

  • Synthek - A New Journey (Natch Records) - I play this one a fair bit faster than the original

  • Pearson Sound - XLB (self-released, aka David Kennedy from London, England)


  • Oscar Mulero - Sensory Deprivation (MORD)

  • Josh Wink - Denial (L.B. Dub Corporation Remix) - this is one of the ones that didn't make the video version, but it's fun, because it now IS the future. Spooky.

  • Ghost Culture - Safe (Phantasy)- very under-rated release by one of the main chaps behind Daniel Avery's 1st album Drone Logic. You can hear that Korg Mono Poly sound on this one too, James Greenwood's instrument of choice


  • Amandra - Volques (Ahrpe Records) - I believe this is vinyl only

  • Alex Bau - Illuse (Cocoon Recordings) - I love the "end of world" vibes on this. The polyrhythm used here is awesome.


  • Truncate - Focus (Rod Remix) (self-released by Truncate) this is a good song if you want to remind yourself to focus.

  • Leiras - Ruins Of Dignity (ownlife)

  • Ground Loop - Sink (self-released) This is another vinyl release, from Melbourne Australia, and they have a Bandcamp as well with the digital.


  • Kangding Ray - Ardent (Stroboscopic Artefacts) That label name makes it sound like you're examining something ancient in a petri dish

  • Truncate - Another One (Len Faki Remix) (self-released)


  • Radio Slave - Vision (Obscure Shape & SHDW Remix) (Rekids, which is Radio Slave's label aka Matt Edwards)

  • Dimi Angelis - Dwarf Planets (Construct Re-Form) This one is vinyl only. I like this, although it appears that not much is changing throughout the song, I personally hear all sorts morphing as the song progresses. Subtle stuff


  • Moderat - Running (Shed remix) (Monkeytown Records) - This was the original ending of the video, but for some reason this particular song (Running) is ban ned from being used on youtube so I had to re-render the video and upload the whole thing again. Not a great way of getting your music played! Maybe they wanted to be paid or something wild like that


    • Shenanigans:

  • Diplomatic Enjoy aka Electric Colour
  • Pure Techno Underground on Spotify
  • Soundcloud
  • Instagram

item.title: Deep Classics To Cutting Edge - Pure Techno Underground, EP01
item.description:
Deep Classics To Cutting Edge - Pure Techno Underground, EP01

Hi welcome to Pure Techno Underground, a new series where we'll try and showcase some of the best techno out there and techno only. No pop fluff, major label garbage, just the good stuff. First up the most truly excellent...

  • ”5.3” by Architectural (self-released) , hailing from Espana.

  • ”Cold Welding” by Woo York by Soma Quality Recordings.

  • ”Charming Sandworms” by Ruhig on Midgar (Berlin based)

  • ”Kosmos in Deep” by 3KZ on Fides (Italian label owned by Giuseppe Maffei aka Z.i.P.P.O)

  • ”En Lingun Lugar” by Adriana Lopez on Modularz, an Los Angeles label owned by Developer

  • ”Rek” by Karenn on Voam which is Karenn's label, Karenn are of course Pariah and Blawan

  • ”Elqnt” by Temudo and V i L on SK Black

  • ”Planetary Boundaries” by Acronym on Semantica Records

  • ”Prospect” by Deepbass on Informa Records

  • ”Blind Mass” by Tobias on Ostgut Ton

  • ”Kalosi” by Blawan on his own label Ternesc, on an album called Wet Will Always Dry

  • ”There Is Hope” by Dario Zenker on Ilian Tape - The question is what was Mario (of the Zenker Brothers ) doing at the time? Making pasta from scratch? What does a Zenker do when the other one is making music? Is it like a robot they just stop moving and stare into space?

  • ”Counter-clockwise” by Yan Cook on Cooked which is a Ukraine label founded by the man himself.

    • Shenanigans:

  • Electric Colour
  • Diplomatic Enjoy
  • Pure Techno Underground on Spotify
  • Soundcloud
